channel.title: Comments on: Welcome to Web App Magazines

item.title: By: martha
item.dc:creator: martha
item.description: Great point, Jodi, and thanks for your comment. Yes I think all smart phone users appreciate the ability to access content with their device no matter where they are.
item.content:encoded: Great point, Jodi, and thanks for your comment. Yes I think all smart phone users appreciate the ability to access content with their device no matter where they are.

item.title: By: Jodi Schneider
item.dc:creator: Jodi Schneider
item.description:
Thanks for the detailed overview, Martha!
Another advantage with an HTML5 webapp is that you're not fragmenting the experience: users can get to your content regardless of the platform. Not only is this good for EVERY smartphone user, but it's also helpful to mobile users who want to find the same content at the office on their desktop.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the detailed overview, Martha!

Another advantage with an HTML5 webapp is that you’re not fragmenting the experience: users can get to your content regardless of the platform. Not only is this good for EVERY smartphone user, but it’s also helpful to mobile users who want to find the same content at the office on their desktop.
